item.description:
Lets meet at 7:10 pm. This film received 4 stars in the Hartford Courant. The film synopsis is below. Stars Amy Adams, Emily Blunt, Alan Arkin,

Though they once seemed to have a bright future, life seems to be passing by the Norkowski sisters. Rose, once the most popular girl in high school, is a single mom and works as a maid. Norah still lives at home with their father and parties all the time. When Rose's married lover tells her about the lucrative field of crime-scene cleanup, she pours all her remaining resources into her new business, and recruits the squeamish Norah to help.
item.how_to_find_us: I stil look like my picture
